title: Start building with Gemini 2.5 Pro.
description: We’ve seen incredible developer enthusiasm and early adoption of Gemini 2.5 Pro, and we’ve been listening to your feedback. To make this powerful model available to more…
author: Logan KilpatrickSenior Product Manager
excerpt: We’ve seen incredible developer enthusiasm and early adoption of Gemini 2.5 Pro, and we’ve been listening to your feedback. To make this powerful model available to more developers, we’re moving Gemini 2.5 Pro into public preview in the Gemini API in Google AI Studio today, with Vertex AI rolling out shortly.Priced competitively, this gives developers access to increased rate limits to use with 2.5 Pro. The experimental version of Gemini 2.5 Pro remains available for free with lower rate limits. We look forward to seeing what you build with 2.5 Pro.
text: We’ve seen incredible developer enthusiasm and early adoption of Gemini 2.5 Pro, and we’ve been listening to your feedback. To make this powerful model available to more developers, we’re moving Gemini 2.5 Pro into public preview in the Gemini API in Google AI Studio today, with Vertex AI rolling out shortly.Priced competitively, this gives developers access to increased rate limits to use with 2.5 Pro. The experimental version of Gemini 2.5 Pro remains available for free with lower rate limits. We look forward to seeing what you build with 2.5 Pro.
html:
We’ve seen incredible developer enthusiasm and early adoption of Gemini 2.5 Pro, and we’ve been listening to your feedback. To make this powerful model available to more developers, we’re moving Gemini 2.5 Pro into public preview in the Gemini API in Google AI Studio today, with Vertex AI rolling out shortly.

Priced competitively, this gives developers access to increased rate limits to use with 2.5 Pro. The experimental version of Gemini 2.5 Pro remains available for free with lower rate limits. We look forward to seeing what you build with 2.5 Pro.
